channel.title: dough on Luke's Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in dough on Luke's Cookbook

item.title: Pizza Dough
item.description: Ingredients 2 teaspoons active dry yeast or instant yeast 7/8 to 1 1/8 cups (198g to 255g) lukewarm water* 2 tablespoons (25g) olive oil 3 cups (360g) King Arthur Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 1 1/4 teaspoons (8g) table salt Directions If you’re using active dry yeast, dissolve it, with a pinch of sugar, in 2 tablespoons of the lukewarm water. Let the yeast and water sit at room temperature for 15 minutes, until the mixture has bubbled and expanded.

item.title: Poolish
item.description: Ingredients 1 part flour by weight 1 part water by weight yeast Directions Combine Throw it in the fridge Let it set Use part of it to start bread Feed it a 50/50 mix of flour and water
